name: Dice Roller
content: Dice Roller is a simple app that allows you to roll dice. You can choose the number of dice and the number of sides on each die. It's great for playing board games or role-playing games.

name: Expense Tracker
content: Expense Tracker is a simple app that allows you to track your expenses. You can add expenses, categorize them, and view reports of your spending. It's great for managing your budget and keeping track of your finances.
